long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search and navigate bookmarks by title and domain using a simple command palette interface. Click on the extension icon or use the keyboard shortcut Alt + B (Option + B on Mac) to open the search palette.
